name: random promt (4)
content:
Create a realistic portrait (100% like the face), High-quality. 8K portrait. A woman with long, wavy dark brown hair is smiling warmly at the camera.
She is wearing a soft pink, long-sleeved shirt and denim jeans
She has a pair of sunglasses perched on top of her head.
A silver bracelet is visible on her left wrist.
She is wearing white sneakers with blue accents.
Pose and Action: The woman is sitting upright on a white horse, holding the reins with her hands resting near the saddle.
The Horse: The horse is white with a light mane and is equipped with a colorful, patterned saddle blanket and a yellow and brown striped bridle.
The photo is taken in a sunlit forest or park with many tall pine trees in the background under a clear blue sky.
The ground is composed of reddish-brown dirt or pine needles.
Lighting and Composition: The image is lit by bright, natural daylight, creating a cheerful and adventurous mood. make it realistic 
Add a small handwritten-style watermark that reads ‘Prompt by: anph21’. Use a beautiful cursive font, thin strokes, low opacity, placed at the bottom right. Don’t change the face of reference image
